node.text:
A vacation experience akin to a fairy tale. All the 4 suites at the Kovalam Palace includes a personal butler, luxury limousine airport transfer, curated in suite breakfast, traditional evening tea, a private cultural performance, personal yoga sessions and much more!

For bookings contact: 0471 – 3051234, 1800-4252-2220
mail: reservations.kovalam@theraviz.com, reservations@theraviz.com
